originalText.text: Manhattan Connection provides their clients with a great combination of inventory, efficient website/booking and personal service you can trust. This company is truly revolutionary and their agents provide a wealth of knowledge that eliminates the stress out of apartment hunting in NYC. Manhattan Connection will exceed your expectations and leave you living comfortably in your dream home.

text.text: Manhattan Connection provides their clients with a great combination of inventory, efficient website/booking and personal service you can trust. This company is truly revolutionary and their agents provide a wealth of knowledge that eliminates the stress out of apartment hunting in NYC. originalText.text: As a somewhat recent transplant, I did not have a ton of leasing experience in NYC...I barely knew what I wanted and had no idea what to look for.  It was a huge relief to be matched with Yossi Bublil from Manhattan Connections to help me in my search.  With Yossi's deep knowledge of the city/neighborhoods, he quickly identified the right options and streamlined our process...which for a busy cosmopolitan working woman I greatly appreciated the speedy no stress process.  His dedication to find my "perfect" home was really unparalleled to any experience I have ever had leasing in both NYC and Los Angeles and would highly recommend him to anyone looking to move in the city.

originalText.text: BAIT AND SWITCH - AVOID SPENCER POSECAI AT ALL COSTS!! He is posting ads for apartments that are no longer available - my wife and I responded to an ad that was up for 16 hours and after setting an appointment Spencer didnt even have the nerve to show up himself - he sent one of his minions and that guy had told my wife and i that the apartment that Spencer booked our showing for was taken over a week ago - totally unprofessional and a total waste of time.
